import React, { useState } from "react" import "./ExpenseItem.css" import ExpenseDate from "./ExpenseDate" import Card from "../UI/Card" /** * * @param {object} props * @returns */ const ExpenseItem = (props) => { /** * ReactHook -> update the title variable * title = current State Value * setTitle = update State Value */ const [title, setTitle] = useState(props.title) const clickHandler = () => { setTitle('Updated!!') console.log(title) } return (

{title}

${props.amount}
 ) } export default ExpenseItem
